group_1.narration: I wouldn't have been able to make so many@bombs by myself, but thanks to Hanna,@I could make a spectacular array of them.
Everything is ready, let's start the second phase@of the "Let's Ruin Everything Plan!"

group_1.textRight: Where should we plant our very first bomb?

group_1.textLeft: Of course it would be here!

group_1.textRight: Sena, if you speak too loud,@the police will find us...

group_1.textLeft: Oh, Hanna, is it fine to drop the bombs?
My hand slipped and I dropped one...

group_1.textRight: No... I didn't think someone would@drop a bomb so casually...

group_1.textLeft: Oh... It's nothing. I'm fine, surprisingly.
I've been through a lot, but this will clear it up.
Let's make this place explode too!

group_1.textRight: Great!@Especially here, let's blow it up carefully!

group_1.textLeft: Let's make this place explode too!
What's with the resemblance to my house?@I don't know, asshole!
Hahaha! I wish all these things would disappear!

group_1.textCenter: This rooftop is so similar it makes me angry!
That's why I hope it disappears already!
I'll wipe it out with this bomb!
It's better if it's gone from our memories!

group_1.narration: Yes...@Do me a favor and go away.@Don't stick around me.
I have nothing but lonely memories of this place...@of killing time alone all the time...
So please go away, for my sake...!
When I think back, my life is full of memories@that I wish would disappear...@Pain, sadness, and being beaten down...
People often say that life is wonderful@and that there is a meaning to life,@but that's only true for those who have@memories of being loved.
I have no such memories, so I don't know my own value.@I ended up ruining everything...and myself.
But I have no regrets.@There's just something I can't control@that makes me want to give in to that impulse.
I feel that by making a complete mess of everything,@including myself, I can save myself from@being alone at Christmas, and at all times.
So I'm going to set off bombs,@and before my head is engulfed in memories@that make me want to scream,@I'm going to make everything go away.
I can't even ride the rails of a normal life,@I've just been sitting on its train,@and this is the only thing I can do.
I don't know about love,@so I'll give you a bomb.
I'll give you my anger, my hatred,@my sadness...@I'll give you everything I have...@just get rid of this place!
I wish everything would melt like snow@and disappear with no trace.

group_1.textRight: ...I'm done setting everything up,@now all I have to do is detonate them.
...I'm sure we can see the explosion well@from here, since there's a good view.
...what are you gonna do?@Wanna watch it here with me?

group_1.narration: Hanna's tone was somewhat testing me,@but I still...

group_1.textLeft: I'm not going to watch, I'm going to detonate it.@Give me the detonator.
